alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:28PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Graham County through 615 PM MST... At 528 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thatcher, or 8 miles west of Safford, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thatcher, Pima and Central. This includes Route 70 between mile markers 308 and 335. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
